column4: do i need to install dmraid to access my ntfs raid devices???
are they dynamic volumes, software raid, fake raid, or hardware raid?
Xsss4hell is it just one dynamic volume on top of hardware raid?
are they spanned or striped dynamic volumes at all?
is it a proper hardawre raid or a shitty 'onboard raid controller that needs a driver in windows' fake raid?
ok so it's fake raid, things become much trickier
the dynamic volumes are not spanned or striped, just the two hardware raids that act as two independant stripes
if it's onboard it's fake raid, not hardware raid
it's fake becuase it's a software assisted raid, the driver does most of the raid work
i don't know, i've never used dmraid before
